question:
Consider the following statements about Panchayatana style of temple architecture:
  1. Most of the Panchayatana temples in India are shiva shrines enshrining the lingam-yoni stone slabs of Shiva and Parvati
  2. Kandariya Mahadeva Temple in Khajuraho is an excellent example of Panchayatana style
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
